front.title: Electronic authentication guideline

author.organization: National Institute of Standards and Technology (U.S.).

front.abstract: This recommendation provides technical guidance to Federal agencies implementing electronic authentication. The recommendation covers remote authentication of users over open networks. It defines technical requirements for each of four levels of assurance in the areas of identity proofing, registration, tokens, authentication protocols and related assertions.

seriesInfo.name: NIST special publication; NIST special pub; NIST SP
